extDescription.message: 이 확장 프로그램은 스카우트(길잡이), 사이드(큰낫)과 어드민이 아이와이어에서 세포와 큐브 이슈를 추적할 수 있도록 합니다.

windowAuthTitle.description: 사용자 권한이 필요할 때 대화창에 보이는 타이틀

windowAuthText.message:
스카우트 로그 확장 프로그램을 사용하기 위해서는 당신의 아이와이어 계정을 사용하여 프로그램에 권한을 주어야 합니다.

아래 링크를 클릭하여 프로그램에 권한을 주십시오:

scoutslog.org

권한부여 작업이 완료되면, 이 페이지를 다시 로드해 주시기 바랍니다.
windowAuthText.description: Text to be displayed when the user needs to authorization their account.

windowUpdateText.message:
오래된 확장 프로그램입니다!

걱정마세요, 구글 크롬이 자동으로 업데이트합니다.

계속 이 메세지를 본다면, 확장 프로그램을 새로 설치하세요.

창 종료

panelCellListTooltip.message: 미완료 세포리스트와 남은 작업의 요약을 보여줌

panelHistoryTooltip.message: 본인이 제출했거나 사이드했던 큐브 상세내용 보기

panelTaskDetailsTooltip.message: 선택한 현재 큐브의 입력된 로그 요약 보기

panelTaskEntryTooltip.message: 선택한 현재 큐브의 새 로그 입력 생성

columnCell.description: Column header text when displaying cell names.

columnCube.description: Column header text when displaying cube numbers.

columnLastUpdated.description: Column header text when displaying the date/time for the most recent action of a task.

columnLastUser.description: Column header text when displaying the most recent username of the most recent action of a task.

columnNotes.description: Column header text when displaying user comments for a given task action.

columnOpenTasks.description: Column header text when displaying the count of open tasks for a cell and/or status.

columnScore.description: Column header text when displaying the raw score and consensus percent for a submission in the history window.

columnStatus.description: Column header text when displaying the current status of a task/cube.

columnTimestamp.description: Column header text when displaying the date/time for a submission in the history window.

columnType.description: Column header text when displaying the submission type in the history window.

columnUser.description: Column header text when displaying the username for a task action.

labelCell.description: Noun to reference a specific neuron within EyeWire.

labelCellID.description: Noun to reference the ID number for a specific neuron within EyeWire.

labelConsensus.description: Percentage value indicating agreement, or lack of agreement, with the EyeWire consensus at the time of submission.

labelCube.description: Noun to reference a specific cube within EyeWire. Cube and task are synonyms.

labelLastUser.description: Username of the last person to save an action to the task.

labelLastUpdated.description: Date/time of the last action saved to a specific task in UTC.

labelNotApplicable.description: Abbreviation to use when there is no data/information for a specific item.

labelNotes.description: Noun to indicate user comments/notes for a task action.

labelPoints.description: Abbreviation to use when refering to the EyeWire cube submission score value.

labelReaped.description: Question if user reaped a change within EyeWire for the given task action (entry in log).

labelStatus.description: Noun to indicate current state for a given task.

labelSubmissionType.description: The type of EyeWire submission for a cube (normal, trailblaze, or scythed)

labelTask.description: Noun to reference a specific cube within EyeWire. Cube and task are synonyms.

labelVotes.description: Number of completion votes for a given task

labelWeight.description: Noun refering to the numeric value of a task's confidence.

actionAnnotateTooltip.message: Add details to the captured image(s).

actionCancel.description: Action word to indicate not submitting this log entry.

actionCancelTooltip.message: 로그 입력을 제출하지 않고 창을 닫습니다
actionCancelTooltip.description: Text to display when hovering over the 'Cancel' button.

actionCapture.description: Action word to indicate capturing the image from the 3D view.

actionCaptureTooltip.description: Text to display when hovering over the 'Capture Image' link in the 'New Entry' window.

actionCellTooltip.description: Text to display when hovering over a link to view tasks for a specific cell.

actionHideWindowTooltip.description: Text to display when hovering over the 'X' icon of the Scouts' Log window.

actionJumpTask.description: Action word to indicate switching focus to a specific cube/task.

actionJumpTaskTooltip.message: 아이와이어에서 해당 큐브를 보기 위해 클릭합니다
actionJumpTaskTooltip.description: Text to display when hovering over a 'jump to cube' link.

actionMore.description: Action word to indicate displaying additional entries.

actionMoreTooltip.description: Text to display when hovering over the 'more' link in the history window.

actionNewEntry.description: Action phrase to indicate creating a new task action (entry in log).

actionNewEntryTooltip.message: 해당 작업의 새 로그 입력을 생성하려면 클릭하세요
actionNewEntryTooltip.description: Text to display when hovering over the 'New Entry' button.

actionPreview.description: Action word to indicate viewing the image captured.

actionPreviewTooltip.description: Text to display when hovering over the 'Preview Image' link in the 'New Entry' window.

actionRecapture.description: Action word to indicate capturing the image from the 3D view again.

actionRecaptureTooltip.description: Text to display when hovering over the 'Re-Capture Image' link in the 'New Entry' window.

actionRefresh.description: Action word to indicate updating the display based on selected options.

actionRefreshTooltip.message: 선택한 옵션을 바탕으로 보여지기가 업데이트 됩니다
actionRefreshTooltip.description: Text to display when hovering over the 'Refresh' button.

actionRemove.description: Action word to indicate removing the image from the new log entry submission.

actionRemoveTooltip.description: Text to display when hovering over the 'Remove' link in the 'New Entry' window.

actionSetToGood.description: Action phrase to indicate there are no further issues for a given task.

actionSetToGoodTooltip.message: 더는 다른 이슈가 없는 경우에 "좋음"이라고 표기합니다
actionSetToGoodTooltip.description: Text to display when hovering over the 'Set to Good' button.

actionShowWindowTooltip.description: Text to display when hovering over the 'Show Scouts' Log Window' icon 'game tools' button area.

actionSubmit.description: Action word to indicate saving the new log entry.

actionSubmitTooltip.description: Text to display when hovering over the 'Submit' button.

actionTaskTooltip.description: Text to display when hovering over a numbered task link (e.g. #123456)

actionViewImage.description: Action phrase to indicate viewing the saved image for a given task action.

actionViewImageTooltip.message: 위 작업과 관련한 이미지를 보려면 클릭하세요
actionViewImageTooltip.description: Text to display when hovering over the 'view image' link.

historyConsensusAll.description: Option text to indicate viewing all consensus values

historyConsensus5090.description: Option text to indicate viewing consesus values 50% to 90%

historyConsensus50.description: Option text to indicate viewing consensus values equal to 50% or less

historyConsensusNone.description: Option text to indicate viewing consensus values equal to zero.

historyTypesAll.description: Option text to indicate viewing all submission types.

historyTypesNormal.description: Option text to indicate viewing submissions from normal EyeWire play.

historyTypesTrailblazer.description: Option text to indicate viewing trailblazed submissions from normal EyeWire play.

historyTypesScythed.description: Option text to indicate viewing reaped/scythed submissions.

messageLoading.description: Text to display when loading data for one of the views within the extension.

messageProcessing.description: Text to display when an image is being captured from the 3D canvas.

messageSaving.description: Text to display when submitting a new log entry.

error_notasks.description: Message to indicate no tasks are available for the cell and/or specific task status.

error_submission.message: 죄송합니다, 제출 중에 에러가 발생하였습니다. 다시 해주시기 바랍니다.
error_submission.description: Phrase to indicate a transmission error while saving a task action.
